text:
Hi polyglots :grin:

I’m having a strange issue with a website’s multilanguage redirects.
It is in English and French, and I have activated the automatic redirects (every link gets the language parameter `?hsLang=fr`)

The only page where the language parameter is not being added is the blog listing page :confused:.

Should it be specified somewhere or what?

For example on the homepage the language redirects work:
<https://www.monarchtractor.com/fr/>

And (only) on this blog listing page does not:
<https://www.monarchtractor.com/fr/experiences>
